mapper.select: select P.attach_no,M.* from profile_attach P inner join mem M on P.mem_no=M.mem_no where M.mem_no= #{mem_no}
select count(*) from review where mem_no=#{memNo}
select B.*,R.like_cnt from bookmark B inner join review R on B.review_no=R.review_no where B.mem_no=#{memNo} order by B.bookmark_time
select L.*,R.like_cnt from likes L left outer join review R on L.review_no=R.review_no where L.mem_no=#{memNo}
select count(*) from review_attach where review_no={reviewNo}

select distinct M.mem_no, M.mem_nick, M.mem_intro, M.mem_level, M.mem_point, coalesce(RC.cnt, 0) review_cnt, coalesce(FP.cnt2, 0) follow_cnt, coalesce(FT.cnt3, 0) follower_cnt, PA.attach_no
from ( select * from mem where mem_no=#{memNo})M left outer join review R on M.mem_no=R.mem_no left outer join( select mem_no,count(mem_no) cnt from review group by mem_no )RC on M.mem_no=RC.mem_no left outer join( select passive_mem_no ,count(passive_mem_no)cnt2 from follow group by passive_mem_no) FP on M.mem_no=FP.passive_mem_no left outer join( select active_mem_no, count(active_mem_no) cnt3 from follow group by active_mem_no ) FT on M.mem_no=FT.active_mem_no left outer join profile_attach PA on M.mem_no=PA.mem_no

select M.mem_no, R.review_no, R.like_cnt, R.review_report_cnt, coalesce(RA.rc, 0) img_cnt, coalesce(RP.rcn, 0) reply_cnt from (select * from mem where mem_no=#{memNo}) M left outer join review R on M.mem_no=R.mem_no left outer join (select review_no,count(review_no) rc from review_attach group by review_no ) RA on R.review_no=RA.review_no left outer join (select review_no,count(review_no) rcn from reply group by review_no) RP on R.review_no=RP.review_no order by R.review_no desc

select M.mem_no, M.review_no, R.like_cnt, R.review_report_cnt, coalesce(RA.rc, 0) img_cnt, coalesce(RP.rcn, 0) reply_cnt from (select * from bookmark where mem_no=#{memNo}) M left outer join review R on M.review_no=R.review_no left outer join (select review_no,count(review_no) rc from review_attach group by review_no ) RA on R.review_no=RA.review_no left outer join (select review_no,count(review_no) rcn from reply group by review_no) RP on R.review_no=RP.review_no order by M.bookmark_no desc

select M.mem_no, M.review_no, R.like_cnt, R.review_report_cnt, coalesce(RA.rc, 0) img_cnt, coalesce(RP.rcn, 0) reply_cnt from (select * from likes where mem_no=#{memNo}) M left outer join review R on M.review_no=R.review_no left outer join (select review_no,count(review_no) rc from review_attach group by review_no ) RA on R.review_no=RA.review_no left outer join (select review_no,count(review_no) rcn from reply group by review_no) RP on R.review_no=RP.review_no order by M.likes_no desc

select mem_no, coalesce(attach_no, 0) attach_no, mem_nick, mem_level from ( select TMP.*, rownum rn from ( select * from ( select M.mem_no mem_no, PA.attach_no attach_no, MM.mem_nick mem_nick, MM.mem_login_date mem_login_date, RC.rcc review_cnt, MM.mem_level from( ((select mem_no from mem minus select passive_mem_no from follow where active_mem_no=#{memNo}) minus select mem_no from mem where mem_no=#{memNo} )) M left outer join profile_attach PA on M.mem_no=PA.mem_no left outer join mem MM on M.mem_no=MM.mem_no left outer join (select mem_no,count(mem_no)rcc from review group by mem_no ) RC on m.mem_no=RC.mem_no) where review_cnt>=1 order by mem_login_date desc )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 3 order by DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
select decode(follow_no, null, 'false', 'true') follow_check from follow where active_mem_no=#{activeMemNo} and passive_mem_no=#{passiveMemNo}
